entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
